Name: Burn In
Solver Configuration.Description: Specifies the number of preliminary MCMC steps before samples are being drawn. This may reduce effects from improper initialization.

Name: Rejection Levels
Solver Configuration.Description: Controls the number of accept-reject stages per MCMC step.

Name: Use Adaptive Sampling
Solver Configuration.Description: Specifies if covariance matrix of the proposal distribution is calculated from the samples.

Name: Non Adaption Period
Solver Configuration.Description: Number of steps (after Burn In steps) during which the initial standard deviation is used (only relevant for Adaptive Sampling). If 0 is specified, Korali will set this value to $5%$ of the Chain Length.

Name: Chain Covariance Scaling
Solver Configuration.Description: Multiplier inside of Chain Covariance update in order to control the covariance.

Name: Max Chain Length
Termination Criteria.Description: Maximum number of samples to evaluate for the MCMC chain.

Name: Initial Mean
Variables Configuration.Description: Specifies the Initial Mean of the proposal distribution.

Name: Initial Standard Deviation
Variables Configuration.Description: Specifies the Standard Deviation for each variable. The proposal distribution is defined through a covariance matrix with the variance of the variables in its diagonal.

Name: Cholesky Covariance
Internal Settings.Description: Cholesky Decomposition of Covariance for sampling (using a lower triangular matrix, with rest zeros).

Name: Chain Cholesky Covariance
Internal Settings.Description: Chain Cholesky Decomposition of Covariance for sampling (using a lower triangular matrix, with rest zeros).

Name: Chain Leader LogLikelihood
Internal Settings.Description: The logLikelihood of the current sample.

Name: Chain Candidate Parameters
Internal Settings.Description: Current (theta) parameters of the chain leader sample.

Name: Chain Candidates LogLikelihoods
Internal Settings.Description: The logLikelihoods of the chain candidates.

Name: Chain Candidates LogPriors
Internal Settings.Description: The logPriors of the chain candidates.

Name: Rejection Alphas
Internal Settings.Description: Alphas for recursive calculation of delayed rejection schemes.

Name: Current Rejection Count
Internal Settings.Description: Number of rejections in the current generation.

Name: Database Entry Count
Internal Settings.Description: Number of accepted samples stored in the database.

Name: Sample Parameters Database
Internal Settings.Description: Variable values of samples stored in the database.

Name: Sample Fitness Database
Internal Settings.Description: Fitness of the samples stored in the database.

Name: Chain Mean
Internal Settings.Description: Mean of Markov Chain Monte Carlo Chain.
